description: Detects changes to Microsoft Office protected view registry keys with which the attacker disables this feature.
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Microsoft Office Protected View Disabled
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Office\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Security\\ProtectedView\\*) AND (((winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD (0x00000001)" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\DisableAttachementsInPV OR *\\DisableInternetFilesInPV OR *\\DisableIntranetCheck OR *\\DisableUnsafeLocationsInPV))) OR ((winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD (0x00000000)" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\enabledatabasefileprotectedview OR *\\enableforeigntextfileprotectedview)))))
